name: Samthing Hiroic!
description:
Hiro wants to be a hero... so he takes up the challenge of Assemble & Adventure to find one of the Holy Weapons which will grant him entry to a Hero Casting everybody is dreaming about. But something's fishy and the stubborn forest-girl Sam knows it. The two begin a journey to defeat an evil Capitalism. Oh, wow, how epic!

[Created with RPG VX Ace]
